title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 536.1 - Disruption
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 536.1 - Disruption

State Regulations
A person is guilty of disruption when he or she, by
action, by threat, or otherwise: (a) interferes with university activities; or
(b) obstructs university activities. University activities include, but are not limited to: teaching, research, administration, public service function or other authorized activity or program
on university premises. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
536.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
